pageContext.claim: “Our plan also includes desperately needed humanitarian assistance for those being exploited and abused by coyotes, smugglers, and the dangerous journey north. The requests we have put before Congress are vital to ending the humanitarian and security crisis on our southern border.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is spinning. What he actually proposed are severe new restrictions on Central American children applying for asylum in the United States. The plan is to dissuade these children from migrating by the thousands to the United States -- not to make them safer or provide humanitarian assistance to them.
